From the Desk of Tyler Perry

Contact Tyler Perry plus 59,000+ celebrities, influencers, and public figures using our online database.

(Parody)

Hey Family,

I just wanted to take a moment to connect with you all and share what‚Äôs on my heart.

First and foremost, thank you. I mean that from the deepest part of my soul‚Äîthank you. You‚Äôve been with me through it all, from the first stage play to now, and I don‚Äôt take that lightly.

Your love and support have been a constant source of strength for me, and I‚Äôm so incredibly grateful for every one of you. Of course, I must also thank Oprah and the many black actresses in Hollywood who inspired me.

When I started, I never could have imagined we‚Äôd come this far together. I‚Äôve always said that my stories are yours, and that‚Äôs the truth. Everything I create, I do with you in mind. I want you to feel seen, heard and understood. I want you to laugh, cry, and think about life in ways you may haven‚Äôt before.

I‚Äôm still working hard to bring you more‚Äîmore laughter, inspiration, and stories that reflect the beauty and complexity of our lives. As long as you‚Äôre with me, I‚Äôll keep pushing forward, creating from a place of love and purpose.

So, from the bottom of my heart, thank you for sharing this journey with me. I appreciate you more than words can express, and I can‚Äôt wait to share what‚Äôs next.

Stay blessed, and keep the faith.

Tyler Perry

Tyler Perry Studios

Atlanta, Georgia
